content:
We could easily switch to an @ icon for the mentions area in the left sidebar global filters section:
pasted image
Thoughts?
Main downside is that it may make it a bit less clear what it means if you don't have any, since @-mentions is a particularly clear name for the concept.
In another note we should probably move the @-mentions to top of Starred messages as I think @-mentions are more widely used than Starred messages.
I changed it to Mentions; I haven't gone ahead with swapping mentions and starred messages, since I think it looks worse visually if you swap them.
It actually looks fine without the @-mention; don't really see the difference and it still has @ which is the most important part.
